hero.title: One Year
hero.subtitle: Celebrating one incredible year of Hoyo Buddy - the best Discord bot for Hoyoverse gamers.

supporters.title: Thank You, Supporters
supporters.description: Your support has been instrumental in making Hoyo Buddy what it is today.

translators.title: Thank You, Translators
translators.description: Thanks to your dedication, Hoyo Buddy speaks multiple languages and serves a global community.

thanks.title: Thank You
thanks.message: Most importantly, thank you for being part of the Hoyo Buddy family. Whether you're a daily user, a casual visitor, or someone discovering us for the first time - you make this community special.
thanks.closing: Here's to many more adventures together in the worlds of Hoyoverse! ðŸŽ®âœ¨

giveaway.description: Join our special anniversary celebration! We're giving away monthly passes.

thankYou.title: Thank You
thankYou.description: Thanks for adding Hoyo Buddy, and welcome to an elevated Hoyoverse experience.

addAccount.title: Add your accounts
addAccount.description: Connect your Hoyoverse accounts to unlock auto daily check-in and auto code redeem.

generateCards.title: Generate character cards
generateCards.description: Create beautiful character build cards to showcase your builds.

settings.title: Customize your settings
settings.description: Personalize your Hoyo Buddy experience with custom settings and preferences.

installPage.title: Install Hoyo Buddy
installPage.description: Let everyone in the server use it, or be able to use the app everywhere!
